mapper.sql: id, channelId, sku, skuName, productTypeId, productCode, salePrice, createBy, createTime, updateBy, updateTime, remark, onSale, channelName, productTypeName, productName,departmentName

where 1=1
and id = #{entity.id}
and channelId LIKE concat('%', #{entity.channelId}, '%')
and sku LIKE concat('%', #{entity.sku}, '%')
and skuName LIKE concat('%', #{entity.skuName}, '%')
and productTypeId LIKE concat('%', #{entity.productTypeId}, '%')
and productCode LIKE concat('%', #{entity.productCode}, '%')
and createBy LIKE concat('%', #{entity.createBy}, '%')
and createTime = #{entity.createTime}
and updateBy LIKE concat('%', #{entity.updateBy}, '%')
and updateTime = #{entity.updateTime}
and remark LIKE concat('%', #{entity.remark}, '%')
and onSale LIKE concat('%', #{entity.onSale}, '%')
and channelName LIKE concat('%', #{entity.channelName}, '%')
and productTypeName LIKE concat('%', #{entity.productTypeName}, '%')
and productName LIKE concat('%', #{entity.productName}, '%')
and departmentName LIKE concat('%', #{entity.departmentName}, '%')
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.sku, p.productName, p.productTitle, b.brandName, p.packagePrice, p.saleGuidePrice, pt.typeName, p.productDetail, p.productDetail2, pc.cateName, p.onSale, p.isDelete, p.packageId, t.salePrice, tp.salePrice price, tp.priceStartTime, tp.priceEndTime FROM Products p, t_sale_product t, Brands b, ProductTypes pt, ProductCates pc, t_sale_product_price tp WHERE p.productName = t.skuName AND p.brandId = b.id AND p.productTypeId = pt.id AND p.productCateId = pc.id AND t.id = tp.saleId AND t.channelId = #{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER} LIMIT 50

mapper.update:
update t_sale_product
channelId = #{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sku = #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
skuName = #{skuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
productTypeId = #{productTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
productCode = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createBy = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateBy = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
onSale = #{onSale,jdbcType=CHAR},
channelName = #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
productTypeName = #{productTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
productName = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
departmentName = #{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_sale_product set channelId = #{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sku = #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, skuName = #{skuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, productTypeId = #{productTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, productCode = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createBy = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateBy = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, onSale = #{onSale,jdbcType=CHAR}, channelName = #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, productTypeName = #{productTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, productName = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, departmentName = #{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_sale_product WHERE sku = #{sku} AND channelId = (SELECT id from t_channels_info WHERE channelCode = #{channelCode})
